Class main

java.lang.Object
main
public class main extends Object
main class where user will be prompted for election information file and election system will be run.

  • Constructor Details

    • main

      public main()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      The main method. Calls getInput() and checkArgs() to check user input and run election. Checks if user gives too many arguments or for checkArgs() error.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments given by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException - when getInput() or checkArgs() throws an exception.

    • checkArgs

      private static boolean checkArgs(String[] fileNames) throws IOException
      Checks the command line argument given by the user to get the election information file. Checks if input file can't be found. Calls CPLProcessing.processElection() if election is CPL. Calls IRProcessing.processElection() if election is IR.
      Parameters:
      fileNames - name of election information files given by user.
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if election was run, false if not.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - throws exception if file couldn't be found.
      IOException

    • getInput

      private static String[] getInput() throws IOException
      Reads user input from command line to get filename.
      Returns:
      name of file input by user as a String.
      Throws:
      IOException - when IO error occurs.
